## DesignToken.unsubscribe() method

Unsubscribes a subscriber from change records for a token.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unsubscribe(subscriber: DesignTokenSubscriber<this>, target?: HTMLElement): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  subscriber | [DesignTokenSubscriber](./fast-foundation.designtokensubscriber.md)<!-- -->&lt;this&gt; |  |
|  target | HTMLElement |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
